description._content: Image Description from historic lecture booklet: "The oldest and best known department is the Veterinary. It was founded in 1775 and is the third oldest veterinary college in the world. About 200 of the 500 students who are enrolled in the College are taking this work." Original Collection: Visual Instruction Department Lantern Slides Item Number: P217:set 067 026 You can find this image by searching for the item number by clicking here. Want more?
